facts: Restaurant served food past its expiration date
Customer experienced no illness or symptoms
Customer learned of the expired food the next day
asp_facts: claim(c1). claim_type(c1, negligence). defendant(c1, restaurant). plaintiff(c1, customer). duty_owed(c1, yes). duty_breached(c1, yes). breach_cause(c1, expired_food). actual_cause(c1, no). damages(c1, 0). injury_type(c1, none).
question: Can the customer recover damages for negligence?
rationale: Negligence requires actual damages. While the restaurant breached its duty by serving expired food, the customer suffered no actual harm. Without damages, there is no compensable negligence claim.
